title: Staff Asunder (2R27)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Spell. Skirmish: Discard a staff Gandalf is bearing and then exert him twice to discard a minion he is skirmishing.
Lore:	“At that moment Gandalf lifted his staff, and crying aloud he smote the bridge before him.”
Rarity:	R
